about_the_game:
In the realm of Errodean, darkness reigns under the tyrannical rule of Morgath, an evil sorcerer. Your mission: confront Morgath and restore peace to the land. Embark on a perilous journey and mastering your skills for the final showdown. The fate of Errodean hangs in the balance as you prepare to vanquish Morgath and bring an end to his reign of terror.

Will you rise to the challenge and become the hero Errodean needs?

key Features:


  • Engage in immersive combat with a variety of enemies, from goblins to dragons
  • Explore a fast open world filled with hidden treasures and breathtaking landscapes
  • Customize your character with unique skills and abilities

Join the quest now and become a hero in a world full of danger and adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 (3.3Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 1400 (3.2Ghz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 470 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD (Preferred) Hard Drive
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.2Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (3.6Ghz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT or INTEL Arc A770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Hard Drive

short_description: In the dark realm of Errodean, Morgath's malevolent rule casts a shadow over all. Confront the sorcerer and restore peace. Hone your skills, and prepare for the ultimate battle. Will you rise as Errodean's hero?"
